column4: hi quick question, for windows in terms of free anti virus software that you can put on a windows laptop, i wanted to know what people thought about malwarebytes and how is it and if it is good as an anti-virus protector
It's an unofficial channel, but that's where everybody goes for Windows help.

Well although most people don't mind helping out if they know off the tops of their heads and it's kind of slow like it is right now, that's not what this channel is for, so we always redirect to ##windows. :) Sorry.
